name: Dreditor - TextMate Style for Drupal
description:
TextMate style patch reviewing with the awesome Dreditor for Drupal.org

http://drupal.org/project/dreditor

* 10/20/2010 update:
    - Fixed link color of function name (caused by redesign).
    - Fixed indentation of the wrap background image that indicated 80 characters to account for the +/- the patch file creates.
    - Fixed font-stack by removing Consolas. It doesn't work properly like the others.
    - Fixed .element-invisible not working properly when borders are present.
    - Added: Styling for EOF and whitespace errors.
